page.title: 19CHURCHES
page.content: There are presently two churches being used in this block situated on the main road from Lochinver to Drumbeg.{ { {Free Church of Scotland There has been no parish minister for at least a year but the church is still regularly attended by the elderly congregation.The services are held by the elders or visiting ministers.There is also a{Free Church {Sunday School}which two pupils attend. Both the Church and the Manse are in need of extensive costly repairs.{ { {Free Presbyterian Church Again this church has a small elderly congregation.There is no minister at this Church either. However the parish manse at Lochinver has been restored and a minister has been called.
